Package Controllers

Class ReportHomepage

java.lang.Object
Controllers.ReportHomepage
public class ReportHomepage extends Object
This class represents the controller for fetching and displaying of report data.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws SQLException
      Initializes the controller, sets up the tables with appointment, contact, and customer data.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an SQL exception occurs

    • setTypeTable

      public void setTypeTable() throws SQLException
      Sets up the table with appointment type data. Lambda expressions are used to define the callbacks for the cell value factories of the table columns Retrieves data from the database and populates the table with the number of appointments for each type.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error retrieving data from the database

    • setMonthTable

      public void setMonthTable() throws SQLException
      Sets up the table with appointment month data. Lambda expressions are used to define the callbacks for the cell value factories of the table columns Retrieves data from the database and populates the table with the number of appointments for each month.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error retrieving data from the database

    • setContactTable

      public void setContactTable() throws SQLException
      Sets up the table with contact data.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error retrieving data from the database

    • setContactComboBox

      public void setContactComboBox() throws SQLException
      Fetches contacts from the database and sets them in the contactComboBox.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error retrieving data from the database

    • setDivisionTable

      public void setDivisionTable() throws SQLException
      Sets up the table with customer division data. Lambda expressions are used to define the callbacks for the cell value factories of the table columns Retrieves data from the database and populates the table with the number of customers for each division.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error retrieving data from the database

    • goToHomepage

      public void goToHomepage() throws IOException
      Loads the Homepage view and closes the current stage.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the FXML file for the Homepage view cannot be found.
